amespace(blind_test_path='data/test-blind.txt', dev_path='data/dev.txt', epoch=50, feats='BETTER', learning_rate=0.001, model='PERCEPTRON', run_on_test=True, test_output_path='test-blind.output.txt', train_path='data/train.txt')
